CommandTranslatorRule:
This rule catches calls to the "Select All" command in Edit > Selection menu, that creates a ROI around the whole image.
# Create a ROI around the whole image # Get current ImagePlus image = WindowManager.getCurrentImage() # Create ROI roi = Roi(0, 0, image.getWidth(), image.getHeight()) # Assign it to the image and display it image.setRoi(roi, True)
